subtitle.text: with exclusive training, personalized support, and a high-performance network.
We are an exclusive group of
within LiveGood, dedicated to forming the next generation of successful leaders.

cards.title: Accelerated Growth Strategy
cards.description: We integrate you into an action plan where you advance alongside active leaders.
cards.highlight: ‚öô You move forward, we push with you.

cards.title: Income Potential with Teamwork
cards.description: Thanks to our collaborative structure, you have the opportunity to generate weekly income by keeping your membership active and actively participating in the team.
cards.highlight: üåä New people always come under you.

cards.title: Earnings in Your First 2 Months
cards.description: No experience needed. By following our plan, you can see your first earnings within the first 60 days.
cards.highlight: üìà From zero to your first income.

features.description: A profit system designed for those who want to build a smart business, with active and residual income, even if you're starting from zero.

cards.title: Direct Sales Bonuses
cards.description: Earn up to 50% immediate for each person who registers through you. You don't have to wait until the end of the month. Each sale pays you the following week.
cards.footerText: Ideal to generate fast income from day one.

cards.title: Fast Team Bonuses
cards.description: Are your affiliates also inviting people? You earn from that too. Receive bonuses at multiple levels, creating a domino effect that expands your earnings without limits.

cards.title: Forced Matrix 2x15 Income
cards.description: Just by keeping your membership active, you can earn up to $2,047.50 USD monthly thanks to the automatic spillover system. You don't need to invite anyone to start earning.
cards.footerText: Yes, even without referrals you can generate residual income.

cards.title: Matching Bonuses (Equal Commissions)
cards.description: LiveGood rewards you with an additional 50% of what your referrals earn in their matrix. The more you help others grow, the more you earn.
cards.footerText: A fair way to reward your leadership and vision.

cards.title: Leadership Bonuses
cards.description: When you support your team to rank up, you also earn. The system recognizes your role as a mentor and gives you bonuses for forming new leaders.
cards.footerText: üëë Build a strong team and you'll be continuously rewarded.

cards.title: Product Commissions
cards.description: LiveGood offers you an online store ready to sell high-quality products, no inventory or shipping needed.
cards.footerText: üõí Only for those who love recommending and selling.

cards.title: Rank Bonuses
cards.description: Each new level reached unlocks prizes, bonuses, and prestige within the community. Your effort doesn't go unnoticed.
cards.footerText: üèÜ Feel the recognition as you increase your earnings.

contact.description: Important: This form is to help you join with the right leader and receive exclusive trainings. If you already know who invited you, please indicate it so we can assign you properly and provide personalized support.

form.labelSponsor: Who told you about this project?

whyJoin.ask: Who told you about this project?
whyJoin.four: No forced sales or mandatory repurchases
whyJoin.five: Practical training in leadership and financial freedom

footer.description: We are a community of leaders committed to collective growth. We train new leaders in LiveGood with strategic trainings and a plan that accelerates results from day one.
